Text: Andrew Garfield:  Garfield first came to international attention in 2010 with supporting roles in the drama films "The Social Network", for which he received Golden Globe and BAFTA nominations for his portrayal of Eduardo Saverin, and "Never Let Me Go", for which he received a Saturn Award and another BAFTA nomination.
